channel.title: A Bit of my work
channel.description:
Here's some of my work I've done recently. It's not all that good, but it's a start :P Rate please.
[IMG]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/382/colorfulwarriorwc8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img179.imageshack.us/img179/9800/shadyguyhx5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/7900/angelbu1.png[/img]
And for those of you who feel like putting 9/10 or whatever just for the hell of it, don't... I want some [b]REAL[/b] ratings, with constructive criticism and how I can improve.

item.title: A Bit of my work
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yeah, I was experimenting with the column marquee, I would choose part of the render, so there was no empty part, and transform it, stretching it along the length of the canvas. I’m gonna be looking at a few tutorials and find some stuff I can put into my next one. Thanks ^^

Read full topic

item.title: A Bit of my work
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

I see alot of straight lines, Try to add a curve somewhere in there, ya know? 2nd and 3rd one looks like you use the same background on both and 2 different renders/lighting.
I say 4/10 out of all honesty.

Read full topic
